unnormalised: The grand opening of "Rangmanch", the newest event venue in Jaipur, is slated for 20/10/2024. Located at 12, Hawa Mahal Road, near Badi Chaupar, the venue boasts a capacity of 500 guests. Organizers are promising a dazzling night, complete with performances and a special appearance by Bollywood celeb, Alia Bhatt!
normalised: The grand opening of "Rangmanch", the newest event venue in Jaipur, is slated for twentieth october two thousand and twenty four. Located at twelve, Hawa Mahal Road, near Badi Chaupar, the venue boasts a capacity of five hundred guests. Organizers are promising a dazzling night, complete with performances and a special appearance by Bollywood celeb, Alia Bhatt!

unnormalised: Invitations are being sent out to a select few, including prominent business owners and socialites across Rajasthan. RSVP is mandatory by 15/10/2024 to ensure your name is on the guest list. Address any queries to events@rangmanch.in or call +91-141-222-3333.
normalised: Invitations are being sent out to a select few, including prominent business owners and socialites across Rajasthan. R-S-V-P is mandatory by fifteenth october two thousand and twenty four to ensure your name is on the guest list. Address any queries to events at rangmanch dot in or call plus ninety one dash one hundred and forty one dash two hundred and twenty two dash three thousand three hundred and thirty three.

unnormalised: The venue, owned by entrepreneur Rajeev Sharma, hopes to become the go-to spot for weddings, corporate events, and cultural celebrations. Mr. Sharma believes the prime location and state-of-the-art facilities will set Rangmanch apart from the competition in the Jaipur events scene. It's situated right next to the famous Laxmi Misthan Bhandar (LMB), which should help with the catering needs for the events.
normalised: The venue, owned by entrepreneur Rajeev Sharma, hopes to become the go-to spot for weddings, corporate events, and cultural celebrations. Mister Sharma believes the prime location and state-of-the-art facilities will set Rangmanch apart from the competition in the Jaipur events scene. It's situated right next to the famous Laxmi Misthan Bhandar (L-M-B), which should help with the catering needs for the events.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the venue has already received bookings for several high-profile weddings scheduled for Nov and Dec. Keep an eye out for more updates and exclusive coverage after the launch event! Rangmanch, 12 Hawa Mahal Rd, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302002.
normalised: Word on the street is that the venue has already received bookings for several high-profile weddings scheduled for November and December. Keep an eye out for more updates and exclusive coverage after the launch event! Rangmanch, twelve Hawa Mahal Road, Jaipur, Rajasthan three hundred and two thousand and two.
